v8:item.v8:content: Grupo de las configuraciones del usuario
Список контекстное меню группа команд основные
List context menu main command group
Lista menu kontekstowego grupa poleceń głównych
Lista meniu de context grupul comenzilor principale
Bağlam menüsü komut grubu ana grubu
Lista menú contextual grupo de comandos principal
Список контекстное меню группа команд дополнительные
List context menu additional command group
Lista menu kontekstowego dodatkowa grupa poleceń
Listează meniul context din grupul de comandă suplimentar
Bağlam menüsü ek komut grubunu listele
Lista menú contextual grupo de comandos adicional
Listă comenzi standard din meniul contextual
Indicates whether the file is digitally signed or encrypted.
Vorhandensein von digitaler Signatur oder Verschlüsselung
Existencia de la firma digital o la codificación

Settings.QueryText: SELECT FilesInfo.BeingEditedBy AS BeingEditedBy, FilesInfo.Size / 1024 AS Size, FilesInfo.Author AS Author, FilesInfo.CreationDate AS CreationDate, CASE WHEN FilesInfo.DeletionMark THEN FilesInfo.PictureIndex + 1 ELSE FilesInfo.PictureIndex END AS PictureIndex, FilesInfo.Description AS Description, FilesInfo.Details AS Details, FilesInfo.File AS Ref, FilesInfo.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, CASE WHEN FilesInfo.BeingEditedBy = &CurrentUser THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS EditedByCurrentUser, FilesInfo.FileOwner AS FileOwner, FilesInfo.Extension AS Extension, FilesInfo.StoreVersions AS StoreVersions, FilesInfo.SignedEncryptedPictureNumber AS SignedEncryptedPictureNumber, FilesInfo.Internal AS Internal FROM InformationRegister.FilesInfo AS FilesInfo WHERE NOT FilesInfo.File.Ref IS NULL

v8:item.v8:content: Сохранить файл на диск или другое устройство
Save the file to a hard drive or another device.
Zapisz plik na dysk albo na inne urządzenie
Speichern Sie die Datei auf der Festplatte oder einem anderen Gerät
Salvați fișierul pe disc sau pe alt dispozitiv
Dosyayı diske veya başka bir cihaza kaydet
Guardar el archivo en el disco u otro dispositivo
Mark for deletion / Clear deletion mark
Marcați pentru ștergere/ Marcat la ștergere
Marcar para borrar/ Quitar la marca
